attributes.action: give the people of this country a referendum on the EU TREATY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
TONY BLAIR AND GORDON BROWN PROMISED THIS COUNTRY A REFERENDUM ON THE EU TREATY,PERHAPS THE PRIME MINISTER FEELS THAT AS HE WAS NOT ELECTED DEMOCRATICALY HE DOES NOT HAVE TO LIVE UP TO HIS WORD. IF WE DO NOT GET THE REFERENDUM HE WILL BE PROVING BEYOND ANY DOUBT THAT HE IS A MAN LACKING COMPLETELY IN INTEGRITY OR MORALITY AND CERTAINLY HAS NO CREDIBILITY AS THE LEADER OF THIS COUNTRY.
LETS SEE THIS PETITION SUPPORTED BY ALL HONEST AND HARD WORKING PEOPLE OF BRITAIN.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
